ingredients.item: 25g essential Waitrose Parmigiano Reggiano, finely grated
2 tbsp essential Waitrose Creamy Soft Cheese
260g pack Waitrose Skinless & Boneless Cod Fillets
210g pack Waitrose Rainbow Stir Fry (selected stores)

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. To make the topping, combine the Parmigiano Reggiano, soft cheese, oats, seeds and chives, and season.
Place the cod in a roasting tin and press the crumble on top. Roast for 15 minutes until just cooked through.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the stir-fry mix for 3-4 minutes. Top with the cod.
